verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> which you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

If you <S%H7069>buy<s%> an <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%>: and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing<s%>.
If he came <S%H935>in<s%> by <S%H1610>himself<s%>, he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H1610>himself<s%>: if he were <S%H1167>married<s%>, then his <S%H802>wife<s%> shall go out with <S%H3318>him<s%>.

If his <S%H113>master<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> him a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and she have <S%H3205>born<s%> him <S%H1121>sons<s%> or <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; the <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H3206>sons<s%> shall be her <S%H113>master<s%>'s, and he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H1610>himself<s%>.

And if the <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H559>plainly<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, I <S%H157>love<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%>, my <S%H802>wife<s%>, and my <S%H1121>sons<s%>; I will not go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>:

Then his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> him unto the <S%H430>judges<s%>; he shall also <S%H5066>bring<s%> him to the <S%H1817>door<s%>, or unto the door <S%H4201>post<s%>; and his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H7527>bore<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> through with an <S%H4836>awl<s%>; and he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to be a <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, she shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> as the <S%H5650>menservants<s%> <S%H3318>do<s%>.

If she <S%H7451>please<s%> not her <S%H113>master<s%>, who has <S%H3259>married<s%> her to <S%H6299>himself<s%>, then shall he let her be redeemed: to <S%H4376>sell<s%> her unto a <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H5971>nation<s%> he shall have no <S%H4910>power<s%>, seeing he has dealt deceitfully with <S%H898>her<s%>.
And if he have <S%H3259>married<s%> her unto his <S%H1121>son<s%>, he shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with her after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
If he <S%H3947>take<s%> him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7607>wife<s%>; her food, her <S%H3682>stew<s%>, and her duty of <S%H5772>marriage<s%>, shall he not <S%H1639>diminish<s%>.
And if he <S%H6213>do<s%> not these <S%H7969>three<s%> unto <S%H3318>her<s%>, then shall she go out <S%H2600>free<s%> outside <S%H3701>money<s%>.
He that <S%H5221>strikes<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, so that he <S%H4191>die<s%>, shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And if a man lie not in <S%H6658>wait<s%>, but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H579>deliver<s%> him into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; then I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> you a <S%H4725>place<s%> where he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%>.

But if a <S%H376>man<s%> come <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> upon his <S%H7453>two<s%>, to <S%H2026>kill<s%> him with <S%H6195>guile<s%>; you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> him from my <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that he may <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And he that <S%H5221>strikes<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, or his <S%H517>mother<s%>, shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
And he that <S%H1589>stealeth<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, and <S%H4376>sells<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, or if he be found in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
And he that <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, or his <S%H517>mother<s%>, shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And if <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7378>argued<s%> <S%H376>together<s%>, and one <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%> with a <S%H68>stone<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> with his <S%H106>fist<s%>, and he <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5307>not<s%>, but keeps his <S%H4904>bed<s%>:

If he rise <S%H6965>again<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> upon his <S%H4938>staff<s%>, then shall he that <S%H5221>struck<s%> him be <S%H5352>quit<s%>: only he shall <S%H5414>pay<s%> for the loss of his <S%H7674>time<s%>, and shall cause him to be <S%H7495>thoroughly<s%> <S%H7495>healed<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, or his <S%H519>maid<s%>, with a <S%H7626>rod<s%>, and he <S%H4191>die<s%> under his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; he shall be <S%H5358>surely<s%> <S%H5358>punished<s%>.
<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%>, if he <S%H5975>stands<s%> in a <S%H3117>day<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%>, he shall not be <S%H5358>punished<s%>: for he is his <S%H3701>money<s%>.

If <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5327>argued<s%>, and <S%H5062>hurt<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> with <S%H2030>child<s%>, so that her <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H3318>departs<s%> from <S%H611>her<s%>, and yet no mischief follow: he shall be <S%H6064>surely<s%> <S%H6064>punished<s%>, according as the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H1167>husband<s%> will <S%H7896>lay<s%> upon <S%H5414>him<s%>; and he shall pay as the judges <S%H6414>determine<s%>.
And if any mischief <S%H611>follow<s%>, then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life<s%>,
<S%H5869>Eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye<s%>, <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth<s%>, <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot<s%>,
<S%H3555>Burning<s%> for <S%H3555>burning<s%>, <S%H6482>wound<s%> for <S%H6482>wound<s%>, <S%H2250>stripe<s%> for <S%H2250>stripe<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, or the <S%H5869>eye<s%> of his <S%H519>maid<s%>, that it <S%H7843>perish<s%>; he shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> his <S%H5869>eye<s%>'s sake.

And if he <S%H5307>struck<s%> out his <S%H5650>manservant<s%>'s <S%H8127>tooth<s%>, or his <S%H519>maidservant<s%>'s <S%H8127>tooth<s%>; he shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> for his <S%H8127>tooth<s%>'s sake.

If an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5055>gore<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> or a <S%H802>woman<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%>: then the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>surely<s%> <S%H5619>stoned<s%>, and his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>; but the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5355>quit<s%>.

But if the <S%H7794>ox<s%> were wanting to push with his <S%H5056>horn<s%> in time <S%H8543>past<s%>, and it has been <S%H5749>testified<s%> to his <S%H1167>owner<s%>, and he has not <S%H8104>kept<s%> him <S%H4191>in<s%>, but that he has killed a <S%H376>man<s%> or a <S%H802>woman<s%>; the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned<s%>, and his <S%H1167>owner<s%> also shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
If there be <S%H7896>laid<s%> on him a sum of <S%H3724>money<s%>, then he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> for the <S%H6306>ransom<s%> of his <S%H5315>life<s%> whatever is laid upon <S%H7896>him<s%>.
Whether he have <S%H5055>gored<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> have <S%H5055>gored<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, according to this <S%H4941>judgment<s%> shall it be done unto <S%H6213>him<s%>.

If the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall <S%H5055>push<s%> a <S%H5650>manservant<s%> or a <S%H519>maidservant<s%>; he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto their <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6605>open<s%> a <S%H953>pit<s%>, or if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3738>dig<s%> a <S%H953>pit<s%>, and not <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H7794>it<s%>, and an ox or a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> fall in <S%H5307>it<s%>

The <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good<s%>, and <S%H7725>give<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> unto the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of <S%H4191>them<s%>; and the dead animal shall be his.

And if one <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5062>hurt<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%>'s, that he <S%H4191>die<s%>; then they shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%>, and <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H4191>it<s%>; and the dead ox also they shall <S%H2673>divide<s%>.

Or if it be <S%H3045>known<s%> that the <S%H7794>ox<s%> has used to <S%H5056>push<s%> in time <S%H8543>past<s%>, and his <S%H1167>owner<s%> has not <S%H8104>kept<s%> him <S%H7999>in<s%>; he shall surely <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> for <S%H7794>ox<s%>; and the dead shall be his <S%H4191>own<s%>.
